title: Plat 2 Support Main looking for OOL
body:
Im a bit late to this but, I'm currently looking for a team for the open ladder
name: inu
Age: 20
current rank: P2 
previous seasons: D4 and D3

um pretty **** with words but uh 
im self critical and always looking to improve as a player and learn more
open minded about criticism and adaptive to meta changes 

i don't really expect much from any teams i play in other then 
actually sticking together and practicing, pls no toxic teams

honestly i just want a team that will actually stay together and try to make something out of it.

open to any offers P5+ 

Have a nice day
